scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:server:coverage && npm run test:client:coverage
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:server:unit && npm run test:client:unit
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:server:fix && npm run lint:client:fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:server && npm run type-check:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules server/node_modules client/node_modules shared/node_modules tests/node_modules
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:build && npm run clean:coverage
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:reset: cd server && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test:all
scripts.precommit: npm run lint:fix && npm run type-check && npm run test:unit
